landing_page_description: Experienced in building and maintaining both front-end and back-end systems with knack for creating seamless user experiences. Enthusiastic about problem-solving, delivering clean, maintainable code, and collaborating within agile teams. Enjoy working with modern technologies to drive innovative solutions.

work_experiences_gmf_desc_1: Performed scheduled and unscheduled inspections to check flight readiness of aircraft.
work_experiences_gmf_desc_2: Maintained repair logs to document all corrective and preventive aircraft maintenance.
work_experiences_gmf_desc_3: Inspected all received aircraft parts to verify compliance with EASA & FAA regulations.

work_experiences_cloudxier_desc_2: Implemented responsive web design principles to create mobile-friendly applications, increasing accessibility for users on various devices.
work_experiences_cloudxier_desc_3: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, enabling effective communication between front-end and back-end systems.
